channel.title: data science on Thezmmm
channel.description: Recent content in data science on Thezmmm

item.title: Matlab
item.description: Command Line Terminal help format 指定数字的格式 who 显示当前有哪些变量 whos 显示当前变量的详细信息 clear 清除所有变量，后加变量名则清除单个变量 ; 句末加分号，不显示计算结果 方向键 显示历史命令 clc 清屏 Matrix 矩阵的输入 Row vector: a = [1 2 3] Column vector: b = [1;2;3] Array Indexing A(row.column) A([row1 row2],[column1 column2]) 得到交集 A(index) A([index1 index2 index3]) A([index1 index2;index3 index4]) Replacing Entries delete row: A(row,:) = [] Colon Operator A = begin:end => A=[begin begin+1 .
